name: NofyNofy
description:
NofyNofy, the game (v1.0)

Synopsis

NofyNofy is a rhythm based survival shooter. You must follow the music and shoot.

In a dream world, your character must fight his nightmares in a joyful and musical atmosphere, following the rhythm.
Historic

The first version of core gameplay was made on 2015 during a gamejam that tooks place in Madagascar.

Here is a refreshed version with new core gameplay and improved rhythm engine.

Manual

Left, Right, Up, Down : move the character

Mouse: turn character

Left mouse : Fire

Gameplay

The gun (top left indicator) indicates that you are allowed to shoot or not

Score (middle top) indicicates indicates the points you have earned

Combo (top right) indicate the combo mode

hearth/life (bottom left) indicate the caracter's life

Beat indicator (circle and square at bottom right) shows shot marks:

  • green and purple indicates the current activated beat. You're allowed to shot at that time
  • white shot mark indicates next/previous corresponding activated beat.
  • grey shot mark indicates desactivated beat. You aren't allowed to shot at that moment.

Follow the music, the beat indicator and the gun indicator when you want to shoot

Sometimes, some beats are desactivated. You have to do a combo to unlock them.


Credits

Unity Technologies for the assets

Aries Beats - Night Ride for the background music

Enjoy
